member.name: M:PCO_BackEnd_WebAPI.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: send email from frontend formatted body
member.remarks: take note of the following formatting %lt;fname%gt; - changes to user first name %lt;lname%gt; - changes to user last name %lt;minitial%gt; - changes to user middle initial %lt;org%gt; - changes to user organization/school %lt;memtype%gt; - changes to user membership type [link text](any valid URL) - to format hyperlinks %lt;br%gt; - changes to end of line limit per line input by 55 char to preserve format
